title: Dear Forbes, Homesteading and Self-Reliance is a Delusion?
description:
Are homesteaders truly self-reliant? Looking at the myth of self-reliance in a modern age and back through history. 

In answer to Forbes article on Homesteading and Self-Reliance is a Delusion from a generational homesteader.
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: The Truth About Homesteader's Contribution
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
